original_text: And the people of Israel did what was evil in the sight of the Lord and served the Baals.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와의 목전에 악을 행하여 바알들을 섬기며

sentences.original_text: And the people of Israel did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성은 주의 보시기에 악을 행했습니다.
